channel.title: Object giving you a random item
channel.description: Ok well I am making a minigame whre in the end you go through a portal. The portal will teleport you AND give you 1 of 4 random items. Lets say the items were 111,222,333,444. How would I do this?(I know how to do the case just not how to make it pick between the 4 items and ONLY select 1!

item.title: Object giving you a random item
item.dc:creator: @pk_george1 pk george1
item.description:
@pk_george1 wrote:

You need to make a random.item in the item.java.

[code]
public static int Rune[] = {1079,1127,1163,1201};

    public static int randomRune()
    {
        return Rune[(int)(Math.random()*Rune.length)];
    }[/code]

Thats an example of one, so for example that one would randomly give you a piece of rune armour.

Then back in your client.java add this

addItem(Item.randomRune(), 100);

Btw thats the code for how it would be on delta.

I hope i helped

Read full topic
item.source: Object giving you a random item
